meanings.definition: The granting or obtaining of a license.
meanings.sent1: Her licensures allowed her to drive legally.
meanings.sent2: The licensures for the new software were processed quickly.
meanings.sent3: His collection of licensures made him feel like a professional collector.
meanings.sent4: The licensures were the keys that unlocked new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Without the proper licensures, they couldn't operate the business.

meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the feeling of licensures after passing the exam.
meanings.sent2: The licensures of the doctors were proudly displayed on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The licensures of the pets in the neighborhood created a sense of community.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, licensures were like badges of honor.
meanings.sent5: The licensures symbolized their dedication to their craft.
